message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. Let me know if that works for you!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you reaching out.  $9000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for. Would you be willing to come down to $8500?  Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, $8500 is still a bit below my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $8750. Let me know if that's more to your liking!
